text: khanditavagiyu allahana bali, (varsadalli) tingalugala sankhye hanneradu. Avanu, akasagalannu hagu bhumiyannu srstisida dinave hagendu vidhisiruvanu. Avugalalli nalku, pavana tingalugalu. Iduve sariyada dharma. A tingalugalalli nivu svatah nim'ma mele akramavesagabedi. Mattu bahudevaradhakarella ondagi nim'ma virud'dha horaduvante, nivella ondagi avara virud'dha horadiri. Nimage tilidirali, allahanu dharmanisthara jotegiddane
